item.title: Roblox: Skateboard Race Simulator Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Skateboard Race Simulator is a well-made and addictive time-killer where you can enjoy the convenient gameplay and take a break from other, more dynamic Roblox games. Here, you play the role of a skater, and you have to increase your strength to participate in competitions and achieve success.

By redeeming Skateboard Race Simulator codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers, which will significantly speed up your progress in the game. Most of the codes offer booster potions that will increase the efficiency of your training or increase your income, so don't miss this chance.

All Skateboard Race Simulator Codes

Working Skateboard Race Simulator Codes

  • 40klikes - Redeem this code to get a double Luck potion.
  • summer - Redeem this code to get a double Strength potion.
  • beach - Redeem this code to get a double Strength potion.
  • kayo - Redeem this code to get a double Wins potion.
  • release - Redeem this code to get a double Wins potion.

Expired Skateboard Race Simulator Codes

Currently, there are no expired Skateboard Race Simulator codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Rewards from Skateboard Race Simulator codes will be equally useful for both beginners and experienced players. So, if you are not an active player, or if you want to be even more efficient, be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Skateboard Race Simulator Codes

Since the Skateboard Race Simulator redemption system is quite common in other Roblox games, experienced players shouldn't have any problems with getting rewards. But if you are a beginner or simply don't understand how it works, here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Skateboard Race Simulator .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. Here, among many other buttons, you will see the one that says Codes. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification below the redemption menu with a list of rewards received.

More Games Like Skateboard Race Simulator

If you like the mechanics and gameplay of Skateboard Race Simulator , but skateboards are not your thing, there are plenty of other similar alternatives on the Roblox platform. Among them, you can definitely find the one you like. Here are a few examples of similar games that you might be interested in:

  • Car Race Clicker
  • Roller Skate Racing
  • Flip Flop Simulator
  • Saber Battle Simulator
  • Climb Race Simulator

item.title: Fortnite: How to Get Wolverine
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Wolverine (Pen & Ink)
  • How to Get Weapon X
  • How to Get Wolverine
  • How to Get Wolverine Zero

Since Wolverine is one of the most recognizable faces in all of Marvel, it's no surprise that he now has 4 different skins in Fortnite , making him officially the most collabed character in Fortnite from Marvel's roster. It seems that Fortnite loves to add Marvel's roster of Mutants and X-Men members, and Wolverine's appearances continue to grow, paving the way for more Wolverine costumes of a different variety, whether those are comic appearances or Fortnite 's own rendition of them.

There are a few different Wolverines in Fortnite , but not all of them are obtainable. Listed below, players will find every Wolverine skin in Fortnite and just how to get them. It's worth noting that some players might be disappointed with the answers for these outfits, but there is always hope for Wolverine's return.

How to Get Wolverine (Pen & Ink)

"The best at what he does, Bub."

  • Introduced In: Chapter 5 Season 3
  • Release Date: July 26, 2024
  • How To Get: Purchased from the Item Shop for 2,000 V-Bucks

To celebrate the release of Marvel Studios' Deadpool & Wolverine , Fortnite and Marvel have brought out yet another Wolverine skin. Whilst the outfit wears the yellow and blue costume of Hugh Jackman's Wolverine featured in the movie, the distinct cel-shaded style dubbed Pen & Ink separates it from the Battle Pass exclusive version of the character seen years ago. Whilst it's a shame it's a cel-shaded style, it's still pretty cool, especially when going into duos with a matching Deadpool.

This Wolverine (Pen & Ink) skin costs 2,000 V-Bucks but comes with a few goodies to make it worth it. Players will receive a LEGO variant to use in LEGO Fortnite , as well as the Wade's Prank back bling which has 4 different drawings of Deadpool taped to Wolverine's back. The last two items are the most desirable, as Wolverine receives Wolverine's Claws as a pickaxe (which makes comic sound effects appear on screen), as well as the Snikt-ing Go Time emote , which showcases the unsheathing of the claws, and lastly, the Classic Yellow & Blue wrap to pay homage to Wolverine's color scheme. If players want to get a matching Deadpool, they can grab both in a 15-item bundle for 3,600 V-Bucks .

Wolverine (Pen & Ink) leaves the item shop on August 13 at 8 PM ET.

Players can also get a Deadpool version from the same Deadpool & Wolverine Bundle.

How to Get Weapon X

"Logan, the first Weapon X, codename "Wolverine"."

  • Introduced In: Chapter 5 Season 3
  • Release Date: July 2, 2024
  • How To Get: Purchased from the Item Shop for 2,000 V-Bucks

Weapon X is a rather unique Wolverine skin to be added to Fortnite , and it features Wolverine just after escaping the facility that has bonded his skeleton with Adamantium. Complete with the famed metal helmet, packs, and plenty of wires , Weapon X is definitely going to be an outfit to reckon with, especially since he comes with his own Adamantium claws to be used as a pickaxe. The outfit has to be purchased in a 2,000 V-Bucks bundle , which will give players the skin, a LEGO variant for LEGO Fortnite , the Experiment X Gear back bling, Weapon X Claws pickaxe, and the X-Tracker wrap. Players can also take the helmet on and off in the edit styles options.

Weapon X was the U.S. Government's attempt at creating the perfect and willing super-soldier. This version of Wolverine is one at his most feral, in which his bones have been encased in Adamantium, and he has just escaped the torturous facility that has forever altered him. It's great to see this variant in Fortnite , and all its charm of the classic Weapon X era.

How to Get Wolverine

"He's the best at what he does."

  • Introduced In: Chapter 2 Season 4
  • Release Date: August 27, 2020
  • How To Get: Complete Wolverine Challenges in Chapter 2 Season 2

Styles

How To Get

Default

Defeat Wolverine

Classic Wolverine

Complete 10 Weekly Challenges from Week 5 or 6

Logan

Complete 60 Weekly Challenges

Silver Foil

Reach Level 140

Gold Foil

Reach Level 180

Holo Foil

Reach Level 220

Wolverine's original comic attire from Marvel's 616 universe could be acquired exclusively in Chapter 2 Season 4, when Fortnite committed to their first Marvel season. Sadly, this version of Wolverine is now lost , and only players who obtained him during this time by purchasing the Chapter 2 Season 4 Battle Pass for 950 V-Bucks have him. It's a shame, as he looks great, and also comes with a Snikt! Built-in Emote that allows him to use his Adamantium Claws as a harvesting tool. Players who have not obtained this Wolverine have no other ways of obtaining him, but luckily there are a few other Wolverine variants that can be acquired.

This Wolverine is practically perfect, as it's taken straight from the Marvel pages, albeit with a divine Fortnite art-style twist. Players can enjoy different versions of this iconic character, from his sleeveless yellow and blue to his classic brown and orange, and of course, his jeans and tank top. This Wolverine provided a style for every type of fan, but there is more for those without it.

How to Get Wolverine Zero

"They call him Patch, and he's the best there is at what he does."

  • Introduced In: Chapter 3 Season 3
  • Release Date: August 1, 2022
  • How To Get: Purchase the August 2022 Fortnite Crew Pack for $11.99

Wolverine Zero is another variant of Wolverine, but fans might be sad to learn that this outfit was another limited-time cosmetic that could have been earned back in August 2022. Players who purchased the Fortnite Crew Pack in August would have received Wolverine Zero, but as of right now, he has yet to return to the item shop . Whilst Fortnite Crew skins can enter the Item Shop, none of them actually have before, meaning players are missing out on the Wolverine Zero LEGO variant, the Muramasa Blade as both pickaxe and back bling and the Best Fight You Ever Had loading screen.

Comic fans might be familiar with Wolverine Zero's outfit, as the eyepatch is commonly associated with Wolverine's alias, Patch. Patch has been used by Wolverine for decades, and has become his go-to disguise to hide who he truly is among those who hunt him in Madripoor. With the Wolverine Zero outfit, the Patch influence is clear, but the outfit instead is taken from his appearance in the Zero War comic, which saw Marvel x Fortnite collab together in a canon tie-in. Whilst Wolverine Zero doesn't come with his claws, he does come with a pretty cool-looking sword, and for players with the Snikt! Emote, they can use it for Patch.

item.title: CoD MW3 & Warzone: Best Static-HV Loadout
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Unlock The Static-HV
  • Best Static-HV Loadout For Modern Warfare 3 & Warzone

The arrival of Season 5 for Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone brings about a fresh stream of content for both games, including the debut of gamemodes like COD Warrior for Multiplayer, additional 6v6 maps, and the much-anticipated return of Superstore for Warzone . Season 5 also brings its own Battle Pass, featuring two weapons that players can earn, one of which is the Static-HV.

The Static-HV is a Submachine Gun that arrived in Modern Warfare 3 with the debut of Season 5. This nifty Submachine Gun boasts an exceptionally high fire rate for a fast TTK, along with a large magazine size to boot. Though the weapon does sport a decent amount of visual recoil, the weapon is a powerhouse in the close-range meta. Here is the best loadout for the Static-HV in Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone.

How To Unlock The Static-HV

The Staic-HV is one of the free rewards within the Season 5 Battle Pass for Modern Warfare 3 , found in Sector 6 . To earn this weapon for free, players must make their way to it by claiming all rewards within previous sectors with their Battle Pass Tokens. The fastest and most surefire way to reach Sector 6 is by unlocking all rewards in Sectors 1, 3, and 5 . Once done, players can then claim every other reward in Sector 6 before unlocking the Static-HV.

Alternatively, players can skip the grind altogether by purchasing the Battle Pass Bundle for Season 5 and using the 20 Tier Skips acquired through the bundle to unlock the Static-HV right from the get-go. The Battle Pass Bundle costs 2,400 COD Points, which will be $19.99 if players find themselves short on the in-game currency.

Following the debut of Season 6, the Static-HV will be made available as an Armory Unlock reward for those who do not unlock it before the end of Season 5.

Best Static-HV Loadout For Modern Warfare 3 & Warzone

This build aims to be a one-size-fits-all for the Static-HV, proving remarkably versatile for both Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone . The attachments for this particular build do a great job of toning down the visual recoil of the Static-HV, along with boosting bullet velocity and range to extend that weapon's versatility from medium range. On top of that, handling and mobility attributes have also received a boost, such as aim-down-sight and sprint-to-fire speed, keeping the weapon fast and reliable for tense gunfights. These enhancements make the Static-HV a great contender for one of the best weapons in the game.

  • Quartermaster Suppressor (Muzzle)
  • Garrote-8 Long Barrel (Barrel)
  • DR-6 Handstop (Underbarrel)
  • Kimura RYL33 Laser Sight (Laser)
  • SPRY 34 Light Stock (Stock)

Best Equipment For Modern Warfare 3

The Static-HV is a fast and reliable Submachine Gun, one which can only be enhanced with the right Equipment. The below Equipment Package provides some nice stealth benefits, such as making the player immune to UAVs alongside eliminating footstep sounds . Other neat benefits include the ability to resupply ammunition from eliminated Operators and a much-needed increase in weapon reload speed .

  • Assassin Vest (Vest)
  • Scavenger Gloves (Gloves)
  • Covert Sneakers (Boots)
  • Mag Holster (Gear)

Best Perk Package For Warzone

This next Perk Package provides some pretty neat Warzone -specific advantages for the player's Static-HV loadout. These advantages include the ability to Tactical Sprint for a longer duration , along with boosting reload speed across the board. Other neat benefits include the ability to replate to full armor with just two plates , along with revealing players using the Ghost Perk on the minimap when UAVs are active.

  • Double Time
  • Sleight of Hand
  • Tempered
  • Birdseye

Secondary Recommendations

For regular Multiplayer, the Static-HV is a solid weapon to rely on, eliminating the need to take another Primary weapon in the Secondary slot. With that being the case, a solid weapon for the Handgun category can keep players covered in situations where they cannot pop off a quick reload for their Primary. Some great options for Season 5 include the WSP Stinger and the Renetti .

For Warzone , however, the Static-HV is not necessarily the only Primary weapon players should rely on, as it is unable to do any meaningful damage at long range. Instead, players should opt for a weapon that is capable of performing well in the long-range meta. Such options include the KATT-AMR , the Holger 26 , the Kar98k , the MCW , and the STG44 which also arrived alongside the Static-HV for Season 5.

item.title: Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Saint Seya, the Legend of Justice is a mobile idle-RPG based on the Saint Seiya manga and published by Wanda Cinemas Games . In this game, you'll need to assemble a team of Knights, level them up, and fight through levels with enemies and bosses. With each level, your enemies will be getting stronger and stronger, so you'll have to experiment with heroes, combine their abilities, and upgrade them and their equipment. Fortunately, you can avoid unnecessary grind, level up your heroes, and even get new ones by redeeming Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice codes.

All Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice Codes

Working Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice Codes

  • PIXSSLOJ - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds and 60 3-star Knight Fragment;
  • IKKIEDHDGH - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds and 88888 coins;
  • IKKIYEBFLO - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds and 5 Summon Stones;
  • HAPPYNEWYEAR2024 - Redeem this code to get 1000 Diamonds, 10 Element Stones and 10 Summon Stones;
  • IKKIQPEHNK - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds and 60 5-star Knight Fragment;
  • AIORIADOKO - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds;
  • MUCAMUS - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds;
  • MERRYCHRISTMAS - Redeem this code to get 1000 Diamonds and 10 Element Stones;
  • ANNIV2SEIYA - Redeem this code to get 1000 Diamonds and 10 Summon Stones;
  • 2NDANNIV200 - Redeem this code to get Perseverance Chest;
  • SSLOJ - Redeem this code to get 1000 Diamonds;
  • VohltSSLOJ - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds and 60 3-star Knight Fragment.

Expired Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice Codes

  • EASTER24SS
  • LOONGYEAR
  • CARNIVAL2024
  • WHATAFAILSSLOJ
  • AQUARIUSWAR55
  • RAMADANCOSMO
  • DC1STSEIYA
  • ADEMBILALSSLOJ
  • CHEVALIERRORO
  • PIXSEIYA1ST
  • AQUARIUSWAR55

How to Redeem Codes in Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice

Redeeming Codes in Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice is quite a straightforward process, but like in most other mobile games, to access it, you'll need to go through the tutorial first. If you still have difficulties, follow the tips below:

  • Launch Saint Seiya: LoJ on your device.
  • Make sure you have completed the tutorial.
  • Click on the avatar of your character located in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • After that, you will see a menu with information about your character and a settings tab just below the center of the screen.
  • Head to the settings tab, and you will see two round buttons.
  • Click on the Redemption Code button with the gift icon and enter the code in the field.

If everything is done right, you will receive a message informing you about what prizes you have received.

How to Get More Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice Codes

Just like Roblox codes, this guide will be updated regularly, so don't forget to visit this page from time to time and bookmark it. In addition to this page, you can also find the latest Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice codes by visiting the game's official social media:

  • Official Saint Seiya: LoJ Facebook;
  • Official Saint Seiya: LoJ YouTube;
  • Official Saint Seiya: LoJ Discord.

Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Sushi Shop Tycoon Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Sushi Shop Tycoon is a Roblox game that will help you feel like the owner of a sushi bar. Initially, your building will not even have walls and employees, but this will change quickly after satisfied customers start to generate income. Although the progression in the game is quite rapid, you can speed it up even more. To do this, you just need to redeem a few Sushi Shop Tycoon codes to get some money for free.

All Sushi Shop Tycoon Codes

Working Sushi Shop Tycoon Codes

  • THIRDFLOOR - Enter this code to get 200 Cash.
  • JOINED - Enter this code to get 150 Cash.

Expired Sushi Shop Tycoon Codes

There are no expired codes at Sushi Shop Tycoon right now. All codes are active, and you can get rewards for them.

If you've played games like Sushi Shop Tycoon , you probably know that over time you get a lot of passive income, but it's very difficult to progress in the beginning. You have to wait a lot before you can buy many improvements for the building or additional workers. Fortunately for beginners, there is a great option to earn money quickly and hire your first workers. You just need to redeem Sushi Shop Tycoon , and thus you will get your first money for free.

How to Redeem Codes in Sushi Shop Tycoon

Similarly to other Roblox experiences, in Sushi Shop Tycoon , the option to redeem codes is available in the game interface, so it is very easy to find. However, if you are a beginner and need help, just use our guide below explaining how to redeem codes in Sushi Shop Tycoon :

  • Fire up Roblox and launch Sushi Shop Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the block of buttons on the right side of the screen. Find the Codes button there.
  • In Codes, paste the code from the list of active codes into the white field and click Redeem.

Remember that Roblox codes often expire, so if you are late, you will not be able to receive rewards. To avoid missing the freebie, redeem the codes as soon as possible.

How to Get More Sushi Shop Tycoon Codes

If you want to receive more Roblox codes, you should bookmark this guide in your browser. We regularly update the information so that you are among the first to know about new codes. If you want to get codes directly from the developers of Sushi Shop Tycoon , then you should visit their official pages:

  • Sushi Shop Tycoon Roblox group
  • Sushi Shop Tycoon Discord channel
  • Sushi Shop Tycoon Youtube channel
